functions.name: summarize_video
functions.description: Generates a concise summary of a YouTube video.

video_url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to summarize.

functions.name: extract_keypoints
functions.description: Extracts key points and timestamps from the YouTube video.

video_url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to analyze.

functions.name: get_insights
functions.description: Provides actionable insights from the YouTube video.

video_url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to process.
